title: Cheat’s chocolate tart
description: The pastry is the only part of this rich, chocolate tart that needs baking, making it perfect to prepare ahead for a dinner party. Equiopment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 36x12cm/14x4½in rectangular tart tin or a 23cm/9in round tart tin.
ingredients: 1 tbsp freeze-dried coffee granules, dissolved in 1 tbsp boiling water
